extendedInfo.description: Introducing Australia's first TV & Movie guide app for Android.â Made by eBroadcast - Australia's #1 online TV guide ââ Download for Free! âDownload the latest TV times and cinema sessions to your phone and get all your viewing needs in one place!Australian TV & Movie Guide: Free Edition is a unique 2-in-1 app that will allow you to view what's on TV and look up cinema session times across Australia, from your Android phone.Australian TV features:â Lists all free-to-air channels in Australia.â Customised to suit your needs - only view the channels you want!â Grid view: swipe up/down/sideways.â Share recommendations with friends.Australian Movie features:â View only your local cinemas - customisable in "Settings"â Daily session times for all Australian cinemasâ New Releasesâ Previews of upcoming releasesâ Top Ten Movies at the Box Officeâ Trailers, IMDB and official websitesâ Share recommendations with friends.You can also upgrade to our PRO version at anytime to enjoy our unique "Follow" feature which will let you keep track of your upcoming favourite TV shows. The PRO version is also Ad-Free.We love feedback, so please leave a review after you download!NOTE: If you receive an "Unable to connect to eBroadcast error" please try uninstalling and reinstalling your app (it is free to do so under the same iTunes account) to clear any issues, before contacting us for further help. Thanks guys!If you are having problems or need help, just contact us:support@ebroadcast.com.auhttp://www.ebroadcast.com.auhttp://www.facebook.com/ebroadcasthttp://www.twitter.com/eBroadcastAU

reviews.title: A great app always easy and correct.recommend.
reviews.comment: As above a great app.
reviews.author: barbara walker

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: It never updates unless you restart your phone, and the movie times are not right!
reviews.author: Josie McPaul

reviews.title: Good for free
reviews.comment: I would buy it if it had a search feature.
reviews.author: nick garland

reviews.title: terrific app
reviews.comment: really worked. even has cinemas schedules.
reviews.author: Edwin Flynn

reviews.title: Needs attention
reviews.comment: Gets confused with the date if you\'re looking at channels after midnight. Freezes up when trying to look ahead to another date. Don\'t seem to interested in improvement on this app
reviews.author: T Tuck

reviews.comment: Nice little app.
reviews.author: Cameron Clayton

reviews.title: M
reviews.comment: practical
reviews.author: Miroslav Krpel\303\241n

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Fast to load, easy to use and always accurate. Very happy with this.
reviews.author: Anne Taylor

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: Worked ok on initial install. Every use since, it says it is loading data for ages, then comes up with an empty guide. That is when it doesn\'t FC.
reviews.author: Barry Ryder

reviews.title: Just installed
reviews.comment: A little slugish... but hey... it works.... I like it... Keep up the good work...
reviews.author: Don Del Biondo

reviews.title: Ok but a few annoyances
reviews.comment: Its an ok app but two things bug me and if the developers fixed them it would make the app more user friendly. 1) sometimes instead of scrolling down it goes to the next page. This can be quite annoying. 2) after reading the info about a show and then pressing back it returns to the schedule for the current time. I then have to flick through all the pages to get back to the time slot I was interested in! VERY ANNOYING!!! You really need to fix this ASAP.
reviews.author: Joseph Freitas

reviews.title: First App I have come across which is a complete screw up
reviews.comment: First screen OK, then goes into some update sequence that never finishes. Not a good advertisement to buy the paid version.
reviews.author: Pat Wells

reviews.title: Difficult to roll time ahead
reviews.comment: What I\'d like to do for TV times is set a time (say, 6:30) and then press a button to roll forward by 30 minutes or something. Otherwise it\'s difficult to get a sense of what\'s on over the evening
reviews.author: Graeme Dunlop

reviews.title: Good app, poor sharing options.
reviews.comment: Like the interface (mostly); simple to use, although you have to get used to it. Lost 2 stars due to poor sharing options for movies. Advice to developers: give us the option to share the movie times too...atm sharing the title of the movie is kinda useless, sharing movie times is far more useful, right?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good.
reviews.comment: This is a good app and reliable, but it\'s hard to scroll downwards on it. It will usually go to the next page instead.
reviews.author: Sally Hall

reviews.title: Not bad.
reviews.comment: Generally good, though controls on a touch screen are a little difficult. When you scroll up and down, often it goes sideways instead.
reviews.author: Jo MITCHELL

reviews.title: Was good, now crap
reviews.comment: Excellent app until recent times. Now whenever you change the day it hangs indefinitely. Pity
reviews.author: Jules Mann

reviews.title: Loading????
reviews.comment: Used to like this but loads channels in the background and I have a loading spinning in the foreground and can\'t do anything...fix....rating goes back up again..easy.  Has been fixed...Thank you..Rating back up
reviews.author: Bruce Gourlay

reviews.title: Ordinary
reviews.comment: Have had this app for ages. For something so simple, it does the job appallingly badly. Sort of like KFC, I\'m tempted to try it every now and again then am left feeling regret that the experience was on the whole so awfully bad. This app gives you all the schedule info you could ever need -  just in a form that makes accessing it as painful as can be.  Won\'t even auto rotate. Such a horrid design. Uninstalling....  goodbye useless app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good except for Reminders
reviews.comment: The Program Guide in my LG Smart TV is hopeless, so I was very happy when I found this App.  Everything is wonderful, esp when comes to programs.  I dont watch a lot of TV but of those times I do, it never goes wrong. One dissatisfaction I have is about reminders. I love to set-up reminders but unfortunately this one carries a lengthy title, with the full name \"ebroadcast notification\", and then the date and time, and name of program.  This has taken one full line and with my Nexus 4, this is about the only thing  I see in my calendar.  I wish they just shorted it to 2 characters, then channel number, and title of the TV show. Maybe one day.....
reviews.author: Paul & Rita
